card.name: Amulet of Kroog
card.text: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Argivian Archaeologist
card.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Argivian Blacksmith
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.

card.name: Argothian Pixies
card.text: Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.

card.name: Argothian Treefolk
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Treefolk by artifact sources.

card.name: Armageddon Clock
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a doom counter on Armageddon Clock. At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player. {4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Artifact Blast
card.text: Counter target artifact spell.

card.name: Artifact Possession
card.text: Enchant artifact Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped or a player activates an ability of enchanted artifact without {T} in its activation cost, Artifact Possession deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Artifact Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by artifact sources. Enchanted creature can't be the target of abilities from artifact sources.

card.name: Ashnod's Altar
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ashnod's Battle Gear
card.text: You may choose not to untap Ashnod's Battle Gear during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/-2 for as long as Ashnod's Battle Gear remains tapped.

card.name: Ashnod's Transmogrant
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Atog
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Battering Ram
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Battering Ram gains banding until end of combat. Whenever Battering Ram becomes blocked by a Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.

card.name: Bronze Tablet
card.text: Remove Bronze Tablet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Bronze Tablet enters the battlefield tapped. {4}, {T}: Exile Bronze Tablet and target nontoken permanent an opponent owns. That player may pay 10 life. If he or she does, put Bronze Tablet into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player owns Bronze Tablet and you own the other exiled card.

card.name: Candelabra of Tawnos
card.text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Artifacts
card.text: {2}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Citanul Druid
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Citanul Druid.

card.name: Clay Statue
card.text: {2}: Regenerate Clay Statue.

card.name: Clockwork Avian
card.text: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Colossus of Sardia
card.text: Trample Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step. {9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Coral Helm
card.text: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Crumble
card.text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Cursed Rack
card.text: As Cursed Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. The chosen player's maximum hand size is four.

card.name: Damping Field
card.text: Players can't untap more than one artifact during their untap steps.

card.name: Detonate
card.text: Destroy target artifact with converted mana cost X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Drafna's Restoration
card.text: Return any number of target artifact cards from target player's graveyard to the top of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Dragon Engine
card.text: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dwarven Weaponsmith
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Energy Flux
card.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

card.name: Feldon's Cane
card.text: {T}, Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Gaea's Avenger
card.text: Gaea's Avenger's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of artifacts your opponents control.

card.name: Gate to Phyrexia
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

card.name: Goblin Artisans
card.text: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, draw a card. If you lose the flip, counter target artifact spell you control that isn't the target of an ability from another creature named Goblin Artisans.

card.name: Golgothian Sylex
card.text: {1}, {T}: Each nontoken permanent originally printed in the Antiquities expansion is sacrificed by its controller.

card.name: Grapeshot Catapult
card.text: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Haunting Wind
card.text: Whenever an artifact becomes tapped or a player activates an artifact's ability without {T} in its activation cost, Haunting Wind deals 1 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Hurkyl's Recall
card.text: Return all artifacts target player owns to his or her hand.

card.name: Ivory Tower
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

card.name: Jalum Tome
card.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Martyrs of Korlis
card.text: As long as Martyrs of Korlis is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by artifacts is dealt to Martyrs of Korlis instead.

card.name: Mightstone
card.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0.

card.name: Millstone
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mishra's Factory
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mishra's War Machine
card.text: Banding At the beginning of your upkeep, Mishra's War Machine deals 3 damage to you unless you discard a card. If Mishra's War Machine deals damage to you this way, tap it.

card.name: Mishra's Workshop
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.

card.name: Obelisk of Undoing
card.text: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you both own and control to your hand.

card.name: Onulet
card.text: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Orcish Mechanics
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Phyrexian Gremlins
card.text: You may choose not to untap Phyrexian Gremlins during your untap step. {T}: Tap target artifact. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Phyrexian Gremlins remains tapped.

card.name: Power Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact's activated abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

card.name: Powerleech
card.text: Whenever an artifact an opponent controls becomes tapped or an opponent activates an artifact's ability without {T} in its activation cost, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Priest of Yawgmoth
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Primal Clay
card.text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types.

card.name: Rakalite
card.text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Return Rakalite to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Reconstruction
card.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Reverse Polarity
card.text: You gain X life, where X is twice the damage dealt to you so far this turn by artifacts.

card.name: Rocket Launcher
card.text: {2}: Rocket Launcher deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Destroy Rocket Launcher at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you've controlled Rocket Launcher continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn.

card.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Shapeshifter
card.text: As Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose a number between 0 and 7. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7. Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

card.name: Shatterstorm
card.text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Staff of Zegon
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Strip Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

card.name: Strip Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

card.name: Su-Chi
card.text: When Su-Chi dies, add {C}{C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Tablet of Epityr
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tawnos's Coffin
card.text: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Coffin during your untap step. {3}, {T}: Exile target creature and all Auras attached to it. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Tawnos's Coffin leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, return that exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the other exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

card.name: Tawnos's Wand
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Tawnos's Weaponry
card.text: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.

card.name: Tetravus
card.text: Flying Tetravus enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from Tetravus. If you do, put that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. They each have flying and "This creature can't be enchanted." At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens put onto the battlefield with Tetravus. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tetravus.

card.name: The Rack
card.text: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Titania's Song
card.text: Each noncreature artifact loses all abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. If Titania's Song leaves the battlefield, this effect continues until end of turn.

card.name: Transmute Artifact
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card. If that card's converted mana cost is less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost, put it onto the battlefield. If it's greater, you may pay {X}, where X is the difference. If you do, put it onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Triskelion
card.text: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: Triskelion deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
